price: 86. Loba: Nazali kosenga bino lifuta te, mpe nazali te oyo azali kokonza na makasi.
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
